languages.text: {n}Одна из воительниц сопротивления, женщина с твердым лицом и мрачным голосом, решительно произносит:{/n} "В таком случае надежды нет. Мы обречены быть рабами ксеносов, но чистая смерть куда лучше такой судьбы. Можем ли мы молить Вашу Светлость о даровании нам Милости Императора?"

{n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"
languages.original_text: {n}Одна из воительниц сопротивления, женщина с твердым лицом и мрачным голосом, решительно произносит:{/n} "В таком случае надежды нет. Мы обречены быть рабами ксеносов, но чистая смерть куда лучше такой судьбы. Можем ли мы молить Вашу Светлость о даровании нам Милости Императора?"

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain slaves of xenos. But a clean death is far more enviable a fate. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Grace?"
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain slaves of xenos. But a clean death is far more enviable a fate. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Grace?"
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}戦士のひとり、厳しい顔に険しい声をした女性が毅然と言う。{/n}「それでは希望はありません。我々は異種族の捕虜であり続ける運命にある。ですが、潔い死は遥かに望ましい運命です。どうか皇帝陛下の安寧をお与えいただけないでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士のひとり、厳しい顔に険しい声をした女性が毅然と言う。{/n}「それでは希望はありません。我々は異種族の捕虜であり続ける運命にある。ですが、潔い死は遥かに望ましい運命です。どうか皇帝陛下の安寧をお与えいただけないでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}一名表情严肃、声音冷酷的女人以坚定的语气开了口。{/n}“如果真的是这样，那我们就没有希望了。我们注定一辈子都会是那些异形的俘虏，但我们也可以自行了断。我们可以请求你赐予我们帝皇安息吗，大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一名表情严肃、声音冷酷的女人以坚定的语气开了口。{/n}“如果真的是这样，那我们就没有希望了。我们注定会沦为那些异形的奴隶，但我们也可以现在就自行了断。我们可以请求你赐予我们帝皇安息吗？”
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Uno de los guerreros, una mujer de rostro serio y voz seca, dice con firmeza:{/n} «Entonces no hay esperanza. Estamos condenados a seguir siendo prisioneros de los xenos. Pero una muerte limpia es un destino preferible. ¿Podemos rogar a mi{mf|lord|lady} que nos conceda la Paz del Emperador?».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los guerreros, una mujer de rostro serio y voz seca, dice con firmeza:{/n} «Entonces no hay esperanza. Estamos condenados a seguir siendo esclavos de los xenos. Pero una muerte limpia es un destino mucho más envidiable. ¿Podemos rogar a mi{mf|lord|lady} que nos conceda la Paz del Emperador?».
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Eine der Kriegerinnen, eine Frau mit einem strengen Gesicht und einer düsteren Stimme, sagt fest:{/n} "Dann gibt es keine Hoffnung mehr. Wir sind dazu verdammt, Gefangene der Xenos zu bleiben. Aber ein sauberer Tod ist ein weitaus besseres Schicksal. Dürfen wir Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bitten, uns den Frieden des Imperators zu gewähren?"
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine der Kriegerinnen, eine Frau mit einem strengen Gesicht und einer düsteren Stimme, sagt fest:{/n} "Dann gibt es keine Hoffnung mehr. Wir sind dazu verdammt, Sklaven von Xenos zu sein. Doch ein sauberer Tod ist ein deutlich beneidenswerteres Schicksal. Dürfen wir Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} anflehen, uns den Frieden des Imperators zu gewähren?"
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Une guerrière aux traits sévères et à la voix grave prend la parole avec fermeté :{/n} « Alors, tout est perdu. Nous sommes condamnés à rester aux mains des xénos. Mais mourir avec honneur est bien plus enviable que subir ce triste destin. Pitié, Votre Seigneurie, accepteriez-vous de nous accorder la Paix de l'Empereur ? »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une guerrière aux traits sévères et à la voix grave prend la parole avec fermeté :{/n} « Alors, tout est perdu. Nous sommes condamnés à rester esclaves des xénos. Mais nul doute que tous ici préféreraient mourir dans l'honneur plutôt que de subir ce destin. Pitié, Votre Seigneurie, accepteriez-vous de nous accorder la Paix de l'Empereur ? »
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Savaşçılar arasındaki katı yüzlü ve sert sesli bir kadın, kararlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "O hâlde umut kalmamış demektir. Zenoların elinde tutsaklığa mahkûmuz. Ancak temiz bir ölüm, ziyadesiyle yeğdir. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size yalvarıyoruz. Bizi İmparator'un Huzuru'na kavuşturur musunuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}One of the warriors, a woman with a stern face and a grim voice, says firmly,{/n} "Then there is no hope. We are doomed to remain captives of the xenos. But a clean death is a better fate by far. May we beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to grant us the Emperor's Peace?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçılardan biri, katı yüzlü ve sert sesli bir kadın, kararlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "O hâlde umut kalmamış demektir. Zenoların elinde tutsak kalmaya mahkûmuz. Ancak temiz bir ölüm, ziyadesiyle yeğdir. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, size yalvarıyoruz. Bizi İmparator'un Huzuru'na kavuşturur musunuz?"
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldierFemale_Ranged_Prison
